name: tlmtps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, ctmd))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopMod, c0 ∈ TopSp, c0 ∈ TopMnd)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, ctps))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c0 ∈ TopSp)

comment: A topological module is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
